section.para: To add a new transaction to a Journal, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:
When adding a new transaction to a Journal, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify the monetary value of the transaction.
Choose one of the following options:
Debit: Select if transaction Debits specified Account.
Credit: Select if transaction Credits specified Account.
Specify the Account to be used for the transaction record.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without adding a new transaction to the Journal, returning you to the previous screen.
Creates the transaction and adds it to the Journal.
